name: The Labyrinth (itch) (erich11)
description:
Delve through the labyrinth, taking on a hoard of zombies.

Use scrolls to upgrade your spells.

Movement:

y k u h @ <- you are herel b j n

f - Use a spell. Move the selector to target, and 'f' again to fire.

. - wait

i - Use an item in your inventory.

w - switch active spells.

> - go down stairs

p - message history

q - quit
